title: Would it be possible to build a bunch of huge air conditioners to fight against global warming? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Would it be possible to build a bunch of huge air conditioners to fight against global warming?” No. Any device that produces refrigerated air will always produce more hot air than cold air. One example is this: “If a freezer is placed in a perfectly insulated sealed room with the controls on high with its door open, how cold will it get in the room?” It won’t get cold, it will get progressively hotter until the freezer overheats and breaks down.
